to be unable to intervene

sentences.english: Golf - solitaire easy to understand, hard to solve.
Still, WWAN can be more convenient, more reliable and easier to set up.
sentences.chinese: 無線廣域網更方便更可靠更易上手。

sentences.english: I prefer to use a double overhand grip except for PR.
sentences.chinese: 我更喜歡使用雙除公關上手抓地力。

sentences.english: They would be based on new , easy - to - use controls.
sentences.chinese: 他們將是新易上手主機的主力消費羣體。

sentences.english: Adding an overhand knot at each crossover increases friction and keeps the lacing much firmer.
sentences.chinese: 添加上手在每個交叉結摩擦和不斷增加的花邊更堅定。

sentences.english: Grasp the bar with an overhand grip and hands slightly wider than shoulder width .
sentences.chinese: 把握一個上手的抓地力和手中的酒吧較肩略寬。
